data.message:
A DANGEROUS, IF NOT SINISTER, INVASION OF PRIVACY: VETERAN JOURNALIST

This is the "spiderweb" of "guilt by association" that U.S. mil-intel uses to condemn Americans as "terrorists" because their paths may have intersected with a "targeted individual." Most of my "friends" are PHONY MILITARY PSYOPS (PSYCHOLOGICAL OPERATIONS) AGENTS WHOM I NEVER 'FRIENDED' -- AN ATTEMPT TO BUILD A FALSE PROFILE OF ME, A CALCULATED EFFORT TO DISCREDIT MY REPORTING.

This is a dangerous invasion of privacy to promote the spiderweb concept, the very premise of which is flawed. Zuckerberg, you are being used as a frontman for a totalitarian police state dragnet.

LOCKHEED MARTIN RUNS DRACONIAN WARRANTLESS TELECOM/INTERNET CENSORSHIP-TAMPERING REGIME FOR USG: VETERAN JOURNALIST
